channel.title: [req]Bases[req]
channel.description:
I am requesting...Say....Commands posts? Bases...For a 'capture the bases' mini game I'm about to start working on...Anyways, I want 3 of them....One blue, on white, and one red...I want them to look like this:
[img]http://www.macbrilliance.com/reviews/review_img/battlefront_scrn/droideka.jpg[/img] (Yes I know thats from a Star Wars game)
But...Not in green. Also...Could someone make little icons on top like in the picture, but have the red one be the zammy symbol, blue have the sara symbol, and white have no symbol.
Would be GREATLY appreciated!!![br][br][size=1]Posted on: April 15, 2009, 03:39:04 pm[/size][hr]Anyone? Anyone at all....

item.title: [req]Bases[req]
item.dc:creator: @roflscape roflscape
item.description:
@roflscape wrote:

Sorry, no1 has responded mate. ill try to do this in my spare time.
ok mate?
thanks.
